mutu-config.common-prefix-map: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> PREFIX skosext: <http://purl.org/finnonto/schema/skosext#> PREFIX dc11: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX ysometa: <http://www.yso.fi/onto/yso-meta/> PREFIX yso-meta: <http://www.yso.fi/onto/yso-meta/2007-03-02/>

task.description: Selects the domain concepts (?domainC) by type, their rdfs:type's (?domainCtypes), and finnish prefLabel (?domainCpref)
task.replace: SELECT ?domainC (REPLACE(GROUP_CONCAT(?domainCtype ; separator=", "),'http://([^,]+?)/([^/]+?)-meta/','$2-meta:') AS ?domainCtypes) ?domainCpref WHERE { ?domainC rdf:type ?domainCtype . ?domainCtype rdfs:subClassOf+ owl:Class . FILTER (!strstarts(str(?domainCtype),"http://www.yso.fi/onto/yso") && !strstarts(str(?domainCtype),"http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl")) . ?domainC skos:prefLabel ?domainCpref . FILTER (lang(?domainCpref) = '*lang*') } GROUP BY ?domainC ?domainCpref

task.description: Selects the YSO concepts (?domainC) by type, their rdfs:type's (?domainCtypes), and finnish prefLabel (?domainCpref)
task.replace: SELECT ?ysoC (REPLACE(REPLACE(GROUP_CONCAT(?ysoCtype ; separator=", "),'http://([^,]+?)/([^/]+?)-meta/','$2-meta:'),'2007-03-02/','') AS ?ysoCtypes) ?ysoCpref WHERE { ?ysoC rdf:type ?ysoCtype . ?ysoCtype rdfs:subClassOf+ owl:Class . FILTER (strstarts(str(?ysoCtype),"http://www.yso.fi/onto/yso")) . ?ysoC skos:prefLabel ?ysoCpref . FILTER (lang(?ysoCpref) = '*lang*') } GROUP BY ?ysoC ?ysoCpref
